description: Family status relationship table.  Contains the relationship to the patient and the name of the family member, as well as the source of this information.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: FAM_STAT_REL_C_NAME
columns.description:
The family status relationship category number for the relationship between the patient and their family member.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: FAM_STAT_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The family status category number for the family member, such as 1 for "alive" and 2 for "deceased". 


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Other


Alive


Deceased


Unknown


Fetus - In Utero


Fetus - Stillbirth


Fetus - Ectopic Pregnancy


Fetus - Termination of Pregnancy


Fetus - Spontaneous Abortion


Fetus - Other


Fetus - Molar


Fetus - Abortion

columns.name: FAM_STAT_DEATH_AGE
columns.description: Age of family member at their death.

columns.name: FAM_STAT_COMMENT
columns.description: This item contains the free text comments associated with a patient's family member status in medical history.

columns.name: FAM_STAT_NAME
columns.description: The name of family member.

columns.name: FAM_STAT_SRC_C_NAME
columns.description:
The family status source category number for the source of corresponding family status information.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Provider


Patient


Parent


Legal Guardian


Proxy User

columns.name: HX_LNK_ENC_CSN
columns.description: The Contact Serial Number of the encounter in which the history was created/edited. If the history was created/edited outside of the context of an encounter, then this column will be blank.

columns.name: FAM_STAT_DOB_DT
columns.description: This is used to calculate the age of a relative. This is either the date of birth (approximate or exact) or part of a range. If it is a range, then this column will be the beginning date and FAM_STAT_DOB_END_DT will store the end date. This range of dates is used to define an age range.

columns.name: FAM_STAT_ID
columns.description: The Unique ID for the family member.

columns.name: FAM_STAT_FATHER_ID
columns.description: Unique ID for the Father

columns.name: FAM_STAT_MOTHER_ID
columns.description: Unique ID for the mother.

columns.name: FAM_STAT_DOB_END_DT
columns.description: If an age range is entered for a family member, then the range is stored as two dates. This column holds the end date and FAM_STAT_DOB_DT holds the beginning date.

columns.name: FAM_STAT_TWIN
columns.description: This item tracks twin relationships among members of the patient's family.  Two family members who are twins (or three who are triplets, etc.) will have the same value on their lines of this item.  A value of 0 indicates that the family member is a twin of the patient.

columns.name: FAM_STAT_IDENT_TWIN
columns.description: This item tracks identical twin relationships among members of the patient's family.  Two family members who are identical twins (or three who are identical triplets, etc.) will have the same value on their lines of this item.  A value of 0 indicates that the family member is an identical twin of the patient.

columns.name: FAM_STAT_COD_C_NAME
columns.description:
The cause of death of a family member of the patient.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: FAM_STAT_SEX_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the sex of a family member of the patient.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Female


Male


Unknown

columns.name: FAM_STAT_GENDER_IDENTITY_C_NAME
columns.description:
Gender identity for a family member.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Female


Male


Transgender Female


Transgender Male


Other


Choose not to disclose

columns.name: FAM_STAT_REL_ID
columns.description: This item stores the unique ID of the patient relationship record. The patient relationship record contains information about how the person is related to the patient.

columns.name: FAM_STAT_ADOPT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Adoption status of a particular family member.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Adopted In


Adopted Out


Adopted

columns.name: FAM_STAT_ADPT_PAR_1
columns.description: The ID of a relative's adoptive parent. We allow two adoptive parents. The other adoptive parent ID is stored in I EPT 20359.

columns.name: FAM_STAT_ADPT_PAR_2
columns.description: The ID of a relative's adoptive parent. We allow two adoptive parents. The other adoptive parent ID is stored in I EPT 20358.

columns.name: FAM_STAT_PREG_EPISODE_ID
columns.description: This item stores a link to the patient's pregnancy information in Obstetric history.

columns.name: FAM_STAT_DELIV_EPISODE_ID
columns.description: This item stores a link to the patient's delivery information for Obstetric History.

columns.name: FAM_HX_FERT_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
This field contains the category value representing a patient's relative's fertility status. 


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Fertile


No Children By Choice


Infertile


Unknown

columns.name: FAM_HX_FERT_NOTE
columns.description: This field is a free text item holding notes pertaining to a particular relative's fertility status.
